item.title: Welcome to Mars! A Beginner's Guide to Hi-tech
item.description: Welcome to Mars! A Beginners Guide to Hi-tech So, you got your dream job in a successful startup company. You passed about 6 interviews, nailed a home assignment (in my case a design assignment), signed an 11 page contract (in English vs.
